VACANCY: ELECTRO-MECHANICAL TECHNICIAN

Ref: CXP104/2024

Operate, test, maintain, and calibrate electro-mechanical equipment
Salary: Market related– dependent on experience and quals
Fixed term contract with potential for permanency
Location: Durban Bayhead

Criteria:
Matric with relevant Qualification
Trade Tested Electrician (Red Seal) with Wireman’s License
5 years proven experience as a qualified electro-mechanical technician in large industries. (Petro Chemical, paper, pulp or large manufacturing).
Able to do mechanical breakdowns. (Hydraulic and Electrical)
Must be prepared to work shifts
Experience on overhead cranes
Advanced experience on fault finding, programming and troubleshooting
Computer literate – MS Office
